original: intros. intros [eps H1] H2. apply locally_ex_dec in H1; [|apply Rle_lt_dec]. destruct H1 as [eps' H1]. apply locally_ex_dec in H1; [|apply Rle_lt_dec]. destruct H1 as [eps'' H1]. exists (Rmin eps eps''). intros y Hy. apply locally_ex_dec. intros y_eps'_lt_f_x. apply H2. apply continuity_pt_locally' with (eps := mkposreal _ y_eps'_lt_f_x) in H1. unfold locally in H1. apply filter_imp with (Q := fun u => Rabs (f u - f x) < mkposreal _ y_eps'_lt_f_x). + intros u_abs_diff_y_lt. apply Rlt_le in u_abs_diff_y_lt. rewrite Rmin_comm. apply Rmin_glb_lt; apply u_abs_diff_y_lt. + apply H1. simpl in Hy. apply ball_triangle with (y := f y) in Hy. apply Rlt_le in Hy. apply Hy.
